    • Constructor Detail

      • CrewMember

        public CrewMember​(java.lang.String newName,
                  java.lang.String newType)
        The constructor of CrewMember class. Which constructs a new CrewMember object and sets the name and type, and repair value if the type is a Mechanic.
        Parameters:
        newName - A string, to set the name of the crew member.
        newType - A string, to set the type of the crew member.

      • canAct

        public java.lang.String canAct​(boolean willSleep)
        A method that return true if the crew member still has actions and is not tired, otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        willSleep - A boolean that gets passed on to the canAct method.
        Returns:
        output Sets to true initially and false if number of actions is 0, or if tiredness is 100.

      • eatFood

        public java.lang.String eatFood​(int quality)
        Crew member eats food and decreases the hunger value of the crew member by an amount int quality. Checks first if the crew member needs to sleep, otherwise decrease the hunger value, and return a boolean true.
        Parameters:
        quality - The amount the hunger value of the crew member decreases by, type int.
        Returns:
        result A boolean type which is true if the hunger value is decreased, otherwise false.

      • healSelf

        public java.lang.String healSelf​(int quality,
                                 boolean canCure)
        Crew member heals self, which increases the current health level by an amount int quality, also checks if the it can cure the infect state of the crew member or not.
        Parameters:
        quality - The amount the health level of the crew member increases by, type int.
        canCure - A boolean, which is true if it cures the infect state of the crew member, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        result A boolean type which is true if the health level increases, otherwise false.

      • sleep

        public java.lang.String sleep()
        Crew member sleeps, which sets the tiredness level of the member back to 0. Passes in a boolean true, to canAct which checks if the crew member can do the following action.
        Returns:
        result A String type which is true if the tiredness level goes to 0, otherwise false.

      • repairedShields

        public java.lang.String repairedShields()
        Crew member repairs the shield of the rocketship. Shield level increases depending on their repair value.
        Returns:
        result A boolean type which is true if the shield level increases, otherwise false.

      • searchPlanet

        public java.lang.String searchPlanet()
        Crew member searches the planet, and returns true if the following action is executed, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        canSearch A boolean type which is true if the action is performed, otherwise false.

      • pilotShip

        public java.lang.String pilotShip​(boolean hasFlew)
        Crew member pilots the ship, and returns true if the following action is executed, otherwise false.
        Returns:
        canPilot A boolean type which is true if the action is performed, otherwise false.

      • nextDay

        public void nextDay()
        This degrades the attributes of the crew member by an amount, when the player goes to the next day. The amount depends on the type of the crew member.

      • takeDamage

        public boolean takeDamage​(int quality)
        Crew member takes a damage, and decreases the health by an amount int quality. Returns true if health is decreased otherwise false.
        Parameters:
        quality - The amount the health of the crew member decreases by, type int.
        Returns:
        isDead A boolean, which is true if health is decreased, otherwise false.

      • infect

        public java.lang.String infect()
        Prints out a message if the crew member has been infected.

      • addNumActions

        public void addNumActions()
        Increases the number of actions of the crew member by 1. Resets to 2 if it goes over 2.

      • printStats

        public java.lang.String printStats()
        Returns the current stats of the crew members.
        Returns:
        output A String type, which has the information about the attributes of the crew member.

      • printActions

        public void printActions()
        Prints the list of actions a crew member can perform.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns the crew member stats.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
